EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify that a case has just been marked as Expedited
EmailTemplate.name: Expedited Order Claim
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} - Order Claim - Expedited Claim {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An Expedited Claim Case has been assigned to your team. Please action this case within on work hour.
Thank you,
Beam Suntory Customer Service
{!Case.Thread_Id}
